forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 54. West wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The night settles over Boston with a serene clarity, the low temperature gently wrapping around you like a warm blanket, hinting at a crispness that whispers of the refreshing September to come. It is quiet now, with the soft murmur of the breeze brushing through leaves, carrying the subtle scent of the distant sea. As morning unfurls, the dawn will greet the city with a vibrant kiss of sunlight, bathing the skyline in warm hues, promising a glorious day ahead, where the high will rise gracefully to 78 degrees. The southwest winds will dance lightly, weaving through the streets, encouraging an easy pace, perhaps urging a stroll along the Charles River or a visit to one of the cozy cafés sprinkled throughout the neighborhoods.

Dressing in light layers will keep you comfortable as you transition from the cool of the morning to the comforting embrace of the afternoon sun. As the city awakens, take a moment to enjoy the rich tapestry of life - perhaps a walk through the Public Garden or a quiet read at your favorite bench, savoring a cup of coffee, savoring the lull of early morning before the world fully stirs. Today offers the perfect blend of warmth and clarity, inviting you to savor the simple pleasures and reconnect with the beauty around you.
